amendment.description: Amendment requires public disclosure of students and instructors at the Western Hemisphere Institute for Security Cooperation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-182 to require public disclosure of students and instructors at the Western Hemisphere Institute for Security Cooperation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 224 - 190 (Roll no. 454).
